content: This morning I had a bit of a disagreement with my wife. I didn't think it was a big deal, but seeing what she's like this evening I think I must have upset her.
translations: ita:Questa mattina ho avuto un po' di disaccordo con mia moglie. Non pensavo che fosse un grande affare, ma vedendo com'Ã¨ qu
